  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4178</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Misurare la corrente elettrica</string>
            <string language="en">Measure current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maßstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente da medida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύμα μέτρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente de la medida</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Impara a misurare la corrente elettrica (ampere) nei differenti elementi di un circuito eletrico.</string>
            <string language="en">Learn to measure electrical current (ampere) on different places in an electrical curcuit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">corrente</string>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">ampere</string>
            <string language="en">ampere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie, elektrischen Strom (Ampere) auf 
unterschiedlichen Plätzen in einem elektrischen curcuit zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez à mesurer le courant électrique 
(ampère) sur différents endroits dans un curcuit électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda medir a corrente elétrica (ampère) em 
lugares diferentes em um curcuit elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε να μετράτε το ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα (αμπέρ) στις 
διαφορετικές θέσεις σε ένα ηλεκτρικό curcuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda medir la corriente eléctrica (amperio) 
en diversos lugares en un curcuit eléctrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ampere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">actuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">amperio</string>
          </keyword>
